import './addHotel.css'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from '../../utils/axios'; import dayjs from 'dayjs'; function AddHotel() { const [data, setData] = useState({ name: 'My Hotel', city: 'Ha Noi', distance: '500', desc: 'Description', photos: [], type: 'hotel', address: '', title: 'The Best Hotel', price: '100', featured: false, }); const handleChange = e => { e.preventDefault(); setData({ ...data, [e.target.id]: e.target.value }); }; return (
); } export default AddHotel;
